mapper.sql: select id, create_time, create_by, create_id, update_time, update_by, update_id, version, school_no, stu_end_time, user_id, test_paper_id, stu_score, made_score, sumbit_state from tk_user_test
mapper.select: select * from tk_user_test where test_paper_id=#{testPaperId} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update:
update tk_user_test
create_time = #{createTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_id = #{createId},
update_time= sysdate(),
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_id = #{updateId},
version = #{version},
school_no = #{schoolNo},
stu_start_time = #{stuStartTime},
stu_end_time = #{stuEndTime},
user_id = #{userId},
test_paper_id = #{testPaperId},
sumbit_state = #{sumbitState},
c_id = #{cId},
stu_score = #{stuScore},
made_score = #{madeScore},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select distinct tg.id as tg_id,tg.name as tg_name from tb_teacher_course ttc, tb_clbum_course tcc, tb_grades tg, tb_teacher tt, tb_course tco where ttc.cid = tco.id and tco.id=#{tcoId} and tt.id= #{createId} and tt.id=ttc.tid and tcc.tcid=ttc.id AND tcc.gid=tg.id

select distinct tc.id as tc_id,tc.name as tc_name,tg.id as tg_id from tb_teacher_course ttc, tb_clbum_course tcc, tb_grades tg, tb_teacher tt, tb_clbum tc, tb_course tco where ttc.cid = tco.id and tco.id=#{tcoId} and tt.id= #{createId} and tt.id=ttc.tid and tcc.tcid=ttc.id AND tcc.gid=tg.id AND tcc.cid=tc.id

select distinct tc.id as tc_id,tc.name as tc_name,tg.id as tg_id from tb_teacher_course ttc, tb_clbum_course tcc, tb_grades tg, tb_teacher tt, tb_clbum tc, tb_course tco where ttc.cid = tco.id and tco.id=#{tcoId} and tt.id= #{createId} and tg.id=#{tgId} and tt.id=ttc.tid and tcc.tcid=ttc.id AND tcc.gid=tg.id AND tcc.cid=tc.id

select tg.id as tg_id, tg.name as tg_name, tc.id as tc_id, ts.id as ts_id, su.id as userId, su.user_name as sys_name from tb_teacher_course ttc, tb_clbum_course tcc, tb_student ts, sys_user su, tb_grades tg, tb_teacher tt, tb_clbum tc, tb_course tco where ttc.cid = tco.id and tco.id=#{tcoId} and tt.id= #{createId} and tt.id=ttc.tid and tcc.tcid=ttc.id AND tcc.gid=tg.id AND tcc.cid=tc.id and ts.id = su.user_attr_id and su.user_type = '2' and tg.id=ts.gid and tc.id=ts.cid

select distinct tg.id as tg_id,tg.name as tg_name from tb_teacher_course ttc, tb_clbum_course tcc, tb_grades tg, tb_teacher tt, tb_course tco where ttc.cid = tco.id and tco.id=#{tcoId} and tt.id=ttc.tid and tcc.tcid=ttc.id AND tcc.gid=tg.id

select distinct tc.id as tc_id,tc.name as tc_name,tg.id as tg_id from tb_teacher_course ttc, tb_clbum_course tcc, tb_grades tg, tb_teacher tt, tb_clbum tc, tb_course tco where ttc.cid = tco.id and tco.id=#{tcoId} and tt.id=ttc.tid and tcc.tcid=ttc.id AND tcc.gid=tg.id AND tcc.cid=tc.id

select tg.id as tg_id, tg.name as tg_name, tc.id as tc_id, ts.id as ts_id, su.user_name as sys_name from tb_teacher_course ttc, tb_clbum_course tcc, tb_student ts, sys_user su, tb_grades tg, tb_teacher tt, tb_clbum tc, tb_course tco where ttc.cid = tco.id and tco.id=#{tcoId} and tt.id=ttc.tid and tcc.tcid=ttc.id AND tcc.gid=tg.id AND tcc.cid=tc.id and ts.id = su.user_attr_id and su.user_type = '2' and tg.id=ts.gid and tc.id=ts.cid
mapper.delete:
delete from tk_user_test where id in
#{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into tk_user_test
id ,
create_time, create_id ,
create_by ,
update_time ,
update_by ,
update_id ,
version ,
stu_start_time ,
stu_end_time ,
test_time ,
user_id ,
test_paper_id ,
sumbit_state ,
c_id ,
made_score ,
stu_score ,
#{id} ,
sysdate(), #{createId} ,
#{createBy} ,
#{updateTime} ,
#{updateBy} ,
#{updateId} ,
#{version} ,
#{stuStartTime} ,
#{stuEndTime} ,
#{testTime} ,
#{userId} ,
#{testPaperId} ,
#{sumbitState} ,
#{cId} ,
#{madeScore} ,
#{stuScore} ,
mapper.select:
select tut.test_paper_id,tut.id as id,tut.stu_start_time,tut.sumbit_state, tut.stu_end_time,ttp.score, tut.user_id,ttp.test_name,su.user_name as sys_name from tk_test_paper ttp, tk_user_test tut, tb_student ts, sys_user su
tut.id = #{id} and tut.user_id = ts.id and ttp.id = tut.test_paper_id and ts.id = su.user_attr_id
